title: The Vineyard.
text: Business Summary The vineyard, 14 hectares in the Var region. The vineyards cover an area of 13 hectares. This grape variety produces wine of AOC ''Cï¿½tes de Provence'' Bio. On the territory there is a house with total area 500 sqm + garden with swimming pool. There are 3 apartments for workers. Commercial buildings: wine cellar, modern warehouse, office, shop for sale of wine. The staff consists of a Director and two employees. The most Western part of the Riviera, the var coast, famous for its wines. The hillsides here are covered with vineyards. The coast is very diverse. Here there are sandy beaches, and limestone cliffs. Further from the coast are low hills, among which the lost medieval village. From the tops of the hills offer beautiful views of the sea. The center of this district is a bustling city of Toulon, a major sea port, playing an important role in the life of France in the sixteenth century. The cost of the vineyard is 9 000 000 euros.
